title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2107 - Proceedings Before Local Rent Administrator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2107 - Proceedings Before Local Rent Administrator

State Regulations
§ 2107.1 - Proceedings instituted by landlord or tenant in the local rent office
§ 2107.2 - Proceedings instituted by the local rent administrator on his own initiative
§ 2107.3 - Notice to the parties affected
§ 2107.4 - Answer
§ 2107.5 - Action by local rent administrator
§ 2107.6 - Final determination by the local rent administrator
§ 2107.7 - Pending proceedings
§ 2107.8 - Modification or revocation of orders

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2107

Statutory authority: L. 1950, ch. 250, as
amd. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
